patterns.agent_pattern: All agents inherit from BaseAgent class with __init__ calling super().__init__(agent_name)
patterns.config_pattern: Configuration constants defined in config/config.py, loaded via environment variables
patterns.api_pattern: External API integrations use client classes with error handling and authentication
patterns.output_pattern: Content saved to OUTPUT_DIR with metadata in JSON format

existing_implementations.description: Found existing agent architecture with BaseAgent providing core functionality (API calls, brand context loading, file output). Social agent shows pattern for platform-specific integrations.
